title: The Dangerous Game mastery is the most powerful mastery in the game.
body:
Take it every time you can, abuse the hell out of it. You will always have an advantage as a team the more instances of the passive you have, especially if your team has assassins/reset champions. You'll deny the enemy gold in close duels, and you can keep yourself alive in clutch teamfights. This single mastery can determine the outcome of the game.

Extreme example, but this was only possible because of dangerous game: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9h8H_X5l714
